Flea Market Find: Dice

Jan 31, 2009

I got these hand painted porcelain dice today at the DUMBO Pop-Up Flea market. The vendor said that she found them in a basement in Atlantic City.  They feel like sugar cubes and I wouldn’t hope for fair odds from any game played with them.  That is of course their main charming factor.
